main.name: Eric Natelson
main.description: with a demonstrated history of working in the financial services industry
main.bio: Floridian transplant in Texas, I am a water sports and all things outdoors enthusiast. Coding is a hobby and my job so please reach out if you are looking to collaborate on an idea!
main.contactmessage: If you would like to chat you can reach me below

education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Science, minor in General Business

work.title: Software Engineer Developer, Executive Reporting
work.description: Currently building a dashboard that will give executive level leaders transparency and context into their agile, monetary, and other performance benchmarks for their objectives, kpi’s, and other initiatives. Users can navigate from the highest levels of company initiatives down to the individual squads that ultimately comprise said initiative. We utilize Angular on the frontend and interface with data engineers building out a Snowflake data lake to supply us with data from various sources. The app is deployed onto the Domo platform as a custom card

work.title: Software Engineer Developer, Investment Operations
work.description: Full stack development of cloud ready applications utilizing Spring-Boot, Angular, and SQL centered around the net asset value, pricing, and accounting of all Fidelity funds.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: 17 week training program where I was taught and assessed on various programming and software engineering principles to smooth the transition from college to full time software engineer.

certifications.title: Certified Scrum Master (CSM)

certifications.title: Certified Product Owner (CSPO)
certifications.description: Attend an in-person course taught by a Certified Scrum Trainer® (CST®) to become a Certified Product Owner.
